review: I bought this because it was a presale for Amazon Prime members and was a discount.  If I had known how great it would work, I would have definitely paid full price.  We have been using gaming consoles for Netflix, Hulu, etc... and many times they sit and buffer for long periods, etc...  We plugged this in and it started right up and wow - no more buffering, hanging or saying it can't play the video.  We have downloaded movies, apps, etc.... with no problem.  There is one app that will occasionally freeze for a second or two and then keep going.  I think is the perfect alternative to other streaming devices and works so much better.  I like that it plugs right into the TV and doesn't take up any additional shelf space.  So far I can say I don't have any complaints about the Amazon stick so far.  We now use it for all of our streaming and movie rentals.
author: Kristy Stout
